channel.title: How we will be handling tutorials [UPDATED]
channel.description:
Since tutorials are a very specialised and long standing thing, we have a slightly different perspective on how and where they should be posted.
Tutorials will be posted on the main page https://0x00sec.org/ People can submit these tutorials using the Github pull request mechanism. All information regarding this submission platform can be found [here](https://gthub.com/0x00sec/0x00sec.github.io)
Discourse will automatically create a topic related to this tutorial on the [Tutorials](https://discourse.0x00sec.org/c/tutorials) category.
Adendum by oaktree: We are still trying to optimize the tutorial integration with the forum, so that it comes out well-formatted on here.
